subject: Marathon Running
Philanthropy
New York City Marathon
Nonprofit Organizations
lead_paragraph: Some race and nonprofit organizers are worried that charitable fund-raising tied to marathons may be wheezing like a runner at Mile 25, with fewer charity runners and less money raised.
snippet: Some race and nonprofit organizers are worried that charitable fund-raising tied to marathons may be wheezing like a runner at Mile 25, with fewer charity runners and less money raised.
